tools.name: AI-COMPASS
tools.primaryPurpose: AI and digital solution discovery platform
tools.bestUseCase: Comparing, aligning, and reusing existing digital and AI initiatives across the enterprise
tools.salesDescription: AI-COMPASS accelerates innovation by centralizing visibility across Sanofi's digital and AI ecosystem. It empowers every Sanofian to discover, compare, and connect with existing solutions, reducing duplication, enhancing collaboration, and driving smarter, faster decisions enterprise-wide.

tools.name: Plai
tools.primaryPurpose: Snackable AI platform for real-time business intelligence
tools.bestUseCase: Real-time data dashboards, AI-driven insights, 360° business view
tools.salesDescription: Plai empowers 20,000 Sanofians daily with AI-driven, real-time business intelligence that transforms decision-making from quarterly reviews to 24/7 strategic insights.

tools.name: Concierge
tools.primaryPurpose: AI assistant for employee productivity and support
tools.bestUseCase: Knowledge search, document creation, meeting scheduling, email management
tools.salesDescription: Concierge is Sanofi's AI assistant that helps employees be more productive by finding information quickly, managing meetings, creating documents, and navigating Sanofi's digital ecosystem.

tools.name: BioAIM
tools.primaryPurpose: AI-driven drug discovery platform for Large Molecule Research
tools.bestUseCase: Hit selection, lead optimization, candidate analysis
tools.salesDescription: BioAIM is the first fully unified and integrated drug discovery platform for Large Molecule Research scientists, improving candidate quality while reducing discovery time and risk.

tools.name: TieGPT
tools.salesDescription: TieGPT accelerates target identification and validation in early drug discovery through AI-powered analysis of biological connections and pathways.

tools.name: MUSE
tools.bestUseCase: Accelerating patient recruitment for clinical trials
tools.salesDescription: MUSE is an advanced AI-powered tool designed to accelerate and improve the development of new medicines by optimizing patient recruitment for clinical trials.

tools.name: Plai ClinOps
tools.bestUseCase: Clinical trial performance monitoring and optimization
tools.salesDescription: Plai ClinOps provides real-time analytics and AI-driven insights for clinical trial operations, enabling faster decision-making and performance optimization.

tools.name: GenAI CSR
tools.salesDescription: GenAI CSR accelerates the creation of Clinical Study Reports through AI-powered document generation, reducing writing time while maintaining compliance.

tools.name: SimplY Plai
tools.salesDescription: SimplY Plai delivers AI-powered supply chain analytics and insights, enabling real-time visibility and optimization across the manufacturing and supply network.

tools.name: GenAIR MSAT
tools.salesDescription: GenAIR MSAT applies generative AI to manufacturing science and technology, optimizing production processes and solving complex manufacturing challenges.

tools.name: MedIS
tools.salesDescription: MedIS delivers AI-powered medical insights to support evidence-based decision making while ensuring compliance with medical and regulatory requirements.

tools.name: DAI Vinci
tools.salesDescription: DAI Vinci optimizes healthcare provider engagement through AI-powered personalization, delivering the right content through the right channels at the right time.

tools.name: Turing
tools.primaryPurpose: Next best action recommendations for HCP engagement
tools.salesDescription: Turing provides commercial teams with AI-powered recommendations for the next best action: what to communicate to HCPs, when to communicate it, and through which channel.

tools.name: PRISM
tools.salesDescription: PRISM delivers AI-powered commercial analytics and insights, enabling data-driven decision making for market strategy and performance optimization.

tools.name: AccelRare
tools.salesDescription: AccelRare uses AI to accelerate rare disease diagnosis by identifying patterns in patient data that may indicate undiagnosed rare conditions.

tools.name: Artemis
tools.salesDescription: Artemis enables cognitive automation for pharmacovigilance case management using AI/ML, improving efficiency and accuracy in patient safety monitoring.

tools.name: Simple to Know
tools.salesDescription: Simple to Know uses AI to transform complex information into clear, accessible knowledge, supporting Sanofi's simplification initiative.

tools.name: Mesh Explorer
tools.salesDescription: Mesh Explorer provides AI-powered visualization and exploration of Sanofi's data mesh, revealing hidden relationships and insights across data domains.

tools.name: Newton
tools.salesDescription: Newton applies AI/ML to manufacturing process optimization, identifying optimal parameters for quality, yield, and efficiency.

tools.name: GenAI Content
tools.bestUseCase: Creating compliant marketing materials at scale
tools.salesDescription: GenAI Content accelerates the creation of compliant marketing and commercial materials through AI-powered content generation, enabling personalized engagement at scale.

tools.name: AI Nurse Agent
tools.salesDescription: AI Nurse Agent provides 24/7 patient support through conversational AI, answering questions about medications, side effects, and treatment adherence.

tools.name: NBI
tools.primaryPurpose: Nurse Bot Interface for patient engagement
tools.salesDescription: NBI delivers personalized patient education and support through an intelligent chatbot interface, improving treatment adherence and patient outcomes.

tools.name: ClinicalBERT
tools.bestUseCase: Analyzing patient data and predicting clinical outcomes
tools.salesDescription: ClinicalBERT leverages specialized language models to analyze clinical trial data, predict patient outcomes, and accelerate evidence generation for better decision-making.

tools.name: BioMap
tools.salesDescription: BioMap uses protein language models to predict protein structures and optimize biologics development, accelerating the discovery of novel therapeutic candidates.

tools.name: Search & Design (Aqemia)
tools.salesDescription: Search & Design accelerates lead optimization through AI-powered molecular design, identifying optimal chemical structures with improved properties and manufacturability.

tools.name: Manufacturing Digital Twin
tools.bestUseCase: Real-time process optimization and predictive maintenance
tools.salesDescription: Manufacturing Digital Twin creates virtual replicas of physical assets and processes, enabling real-time optimization, predictive maintenance, and risk-free testing of process parameters.

tools.name: Patient Digital Twin
tools.primaryPurpose: Virtual patient simulation for clinical trials
tools.bestUseCase: Clinical trial optimization and personalized medicine
tools.salesDescription: Patient Digital Twin creates virtual patient simulations using quantitative systems pharmacology modeling and AI, improving clinical trial success rates and enabling personalized medicine approaches.

tools.name: OneAI
tools.bestUseCase: Building and deploying enterprise AI solutions
tools.salesDescription: OneAI is Sanofi's specialized machine learning operations platform within the AI Foundry, enabling data scientists to build sophisticated AI/ML solutions with collaborative workspaces and scalable infrastructure.

tools.name: Yield Optimization Solution
tools.bestUseCase: Optimizing batch performance and raw material usage
tools.salesDescription: The AI-enabled Yield Optimization Solution learns from past and current batch performance to enable consistently higher yield levels, optimizing raw material usage and supporting environmental objectives.

tools.name: Lipid Nanoparticle Predictor
tools.bestUseCase: Predicting optimal lipid nanoparticles for mRNA delivery
tools.salesDescription: The Lipid Nanoparticle Predictor uses AI to create digital models that predict the optimal selection of lipid nanoparticles for mRNA delivery, reducing the prediction process from months to days.

tools.name: Inventory Position Predictor
tools.salesDescription: The Inventory Position Predictor has proven the ability to predict 80% of low inventory positions, allowing teams to take mitigating actions to secure supply faster than ever before.

tools.name: Electronic Batch Records
tools.salesDescription: Electronic Batch Records digitizes quality assessment processes, moving from paper to digital records, leveraging AI to improve asset utilization and increase productivity as part of Manufacturing 4.0 capabilities.

tools.name: Claude
tools.primaryPurpose: Advanced conversational AI and content generation
tools.bestUseCase: Complex reasoning, analysis, content creation, and code generation
tools.salesDescription: Claude by Anthropic is an advanced AI assistant known for its strong reasoning capabilities, nuanced understanding, and ability to handle complex analytical tasks with high accuracy and safety standards.

tools.name: ChatGPT
tools.salesDescription: ChatGPT provides an intuitive conversational interface to OpenAI's language models, enabling users to quickly generate content, analyze information, and solve problems through natural dialogue.

tools.name: Cohere
tools.primaryPurpose: Enterprise AI platform for language understanding
tools.salesDescription: Cohere provides enterprise-focused language AI models optimized for business applications including semantic search, content generation, and text classification with strong privacy controls.

tools.name: AI21 Labs
tools.salesDescription: AI21 Labs offers specialized language models designed for enterprise content creation, with strong capabilities in long-form writing, summarization, and contextual understanding.

tools.name: Hugging Face
tools.primaryPurpose: Open-source AI model hub and platform
tools.bestUseCase: Accessing, fine-tuning, and deploying open-source AI models
tools.salesDescription: Hugging Face is the leading platform for open-source AI models, providing access to thousands of pre-trained models and tools for fine-tuning, deployment, and collaboration in the AI community.

tools.name: Tempus
tools.primaryPurpose: Precision medicine and clinical data platform
tools.bestUseCase: Genomic profiling and personalized treatment recommendations
tools.salesDescription: Tempus uses AI to analyze clinical and molecular data at scale, enabling precision medicine approaches and personalized treatment decisions, particularly in oncology.

tools.name: H2O.ai
tools.primaryPurpose: Enterprise AI and machine learning platform
tools.bestUseCase: Automated machine learning and model deployment
tools.salesDescription: H2O.ai provides enterprise-grade AutoML and AI platforms that democratize machine learning, enabling rapid model development and deployment with automated feature engineering and model selection.

tools.name: Exscientia
tools.salesDescription: Exscientia uses AI to design precision medicines, enabling Sanofi scientists to test drug candidates against actual human tissue models years before clinical trials. Sanofi partnered with Exscientia in 2022.

tools.name: Formation Bio
tools.salesDescription: Formation Bio partners with Sanofi and OpenAI to engineer custom, purpose-built software solutions across the medicine and vaccine development lifecycle, co-building models to accelerate breakthroughs.

tools.name: DALL-E
tools.bestUseCase: Creating visual content from text descriptions
tools.salesDescription: DALL-E generates high-quality images from text descriptions, enabling rapid visual content creation for marketing, presentations, and creative applications.

tools.name: Midjourney
tools.salesDescription: Midjourney specializes in generating high-quality, artistic images from text prompts, ideal for creative marketing materials and visual storytelling.

tools.name: Stable Diffusion
tools.salesDescription: Stable Diffusion is an open-source image generation model that can be customized and deployed on-premises, offering flexibility and control for enterprise image generation needs.

tools.name: GitHub Copilot
tools.bestUseCase: Accelerating software development with AI suggestions
tools.salesDescription: GitHub Copilot uses AI to suggest code completions and entire functions in real-time, dramatically accelerating software development and reducing repetitive coding tasks.

tools.name: Microsoft Copilot
tools.salesDescription: Microsoft Copilot integrates AI across Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Teams, automating tasks and enhancing productivity throughout the Microsoft 365 ecosystem. Sanofi completed successful M365 Copilot pilot in 2024.

tools.name: Perplexity AI
tools.bestUseCase: Research and information discovery with citations
tools.salesDescription: Perplexity AI combines language models with real-time web search to provide accurate, cited answers to research questions, streamlining information discovery and analysis.

tools.name: Jasper AI
tools.bestUseCase: Marketing copy, blog posts, social media content
tools.salesDescription: Jasper AI specializes in generating marketing content at scale, helping teams create on-brand copy for campaigns, websites, and social media with built-in brand voice capabilities.

tools.name: Copy.ai
tools.bestUseCase: Sales copy, marketing materials, email campaigns
tools.salesDescription: Copy.ai accelerates content creation for sales and marketing teams, generating persuasive copy for emails, ads, and campaigns with workflow automation capabilities.

tools.name: Grammarly
tools.bestUseCase: Grammar checking, tone adjustment, clarity improvement
tools.salesDescription: Grammarly uses AI to improve writing quality across all business communications, ensuring clarity, correctness, and appropriate tone in emails, documents, and presentations.

tools.name: Notion AI
tools.bestUseCase: Note-taking, documentation, project management with AI assistance
tools.salesDescription: Notion AI integrates generative AI into the Notion workspace, helping teams write, summarize, and organize information more efficiently within their collaborative environment.

tools.name: Definitive Healthcare
tools.salesDescription: Definitive Healthcare provides comprehensive healthcare commercial intelligence, enabling pharma teams to identify opportunities, understand provider networks, and optimize market strategies.

tools.name: ZS Associates
tools.salesDescription: ZS Associates provides AI-powered commercial solutions for pharma, optimizing sales force effectiveness, territory design, and go-to-market strategies with advanced analytics.

tools.name: IQVIA
tools.bestUseCase: Market insights, real-world evidence, commercial analytics
tools.salesDescription: IQVIA is the leading provider of healthcare analytics, technology, and research services, offering comprehensive market insights, real-world evidence, and commercial intelligence for pharma.

tools.name: Tableau
tools.salesDescription: Tableau provides industry-leading data visualization and business intelligence capabilities, enabling users to create interactive dashboards and explore data insights without coding.

tools.name: Power BI
tools.salesDescription: Power BI delivers enterprise-grade business intelligence with seamless Microsoft ecosystem integration, enabling self-service analytics and interactive reporting at scale.

tools.name: Spotfire
tools.salesDescription: Spotfire provides advanced analytics specifically designed for life sciences, enabling scientists to visualize complex data, identify patterns, and accelerate research insights.

tools.name: Gemini
tools.salesDescription: Google's Gemini is a multimodal AI assistant capable of understanding and generating text, images, and code, offering advanced reasoning and real-time information access.

tools.name: Cursor
tools.salesDescription: Cursor is an AI-native code editor that integrates advanced AI capabilities directly into the development workflow, enabling natural language code generation and intelligent refactoring.

tools.name: Replit
tools.bestUseCase: Rapid prototyping and collaborative coding with AI
tools.salesDescription: Replit provides a collaborative cloud IDE with integrated AI coding assistance, enabling rapid prototyping and full-stack development directly in the browser.

tools.name: V0 by Vercel
tools.bestUseCase: Rapid UI prototyping and component generation
tools.salesDescription: V0 by Vercel uses AI to generate production-ready React components from text descriptions, accelerating frontend development and enabling rapid UI prototyping.

tools.name: Windsurf
tools.salesDescription: Windsurf is Codeium's AI-powered IDE that provides intelligent code completion, generation, and debugging assistance, enhancing developer productivity across all programming languages.
